casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Walic Christopher THOMAS. No. 435A96-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. John G. Barnwell, Assistant Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of December 2005 by Defendant for Removal of Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006."
